name: nudist
description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.

name: bloodlust
description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others. Furthermore unlike others he is able to gain bloodlust focus inspirations.

name: kind
description: Timmy is exceptionally kind. he has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. he never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.

name: psychopath
description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.

name: cannibal
description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.

name: abrasive
description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.

name: toosmart
description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.

name: brawler
description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.

name: masochist
description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.

name: nightowl
description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.

name: greedy
description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.

name: jealous
description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.

name: ascetic
description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.

name: gay
description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.

name: bisexual
description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.

name: asexual
description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.

name: annoyingvoice
description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.

name: creepybreathing
description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.

name: pyromaniac
description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low. Furthermore unlike others he is able to gain pyromania focus inspirations.

name: wimp
description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.

name: nimble
description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.

name: deftlydodger
description: Timmy has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.

name: sluggish
description: Timmy is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.

name: fastlearner
description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.

name: slowlearner
description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.

name: undergrounder
description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.

name: transhumanist
description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.

name: bodypurist
description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.

name: misandrist
description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.

name: misogynist
description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.

name: greatmemory
description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.

name: tough
description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.

name: torturedartist
description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to gain either a creativity or artistry inspiration after a mental break. Furthermore unlike others he also can gain artistry inspirations when inspired by high mood.

name: gourmand
description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.

name: quicksleeper
description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.

name: slowpoke
description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.

name: fastwalker
description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.

name: jogger
description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.

name: chemicalfascination
description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

name: chemicalinterest
description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.

name: teetotaler
description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

name: sanguine
description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.

name: optimist
description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.

name: pessimist
description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.

name: depressive
description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.

name: iron-willed
description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.

name: steadfast
description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.

name: nervous
description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.

name: volatile
description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.

name: neurotic
description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.

name: veryneurotic
description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.

name: industrious
description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.

name: hardworker
description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.

name: lazy
description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.

name: slothful
description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.

name: psychicallyhypersensitive
description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.

name: psychicallysensitive
description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.

name: psychicallydull
description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.

name: psychicallydeaf
description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.

name: beautiful
description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.

name: pretty
description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.

name: ugly
description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.

name: staggeringlyugly
description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.

name: super-immune
description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.

name: sickly
description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.

name: xenophobe
description:
Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
(Humanoid Alien Races 2.0)

name: xenophile
description:
Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
(Humanoid Alien Races 2.0)

name: dislikeschildren
description:
Timmy dislikes children.
(Children, school and learning)

name: werewolf-child
description:
Timmy is the child of a werewolf and will first transfrom when coming of age.
(Children, school and learning)

name: naturalborncolony-child
description:
Timmy has been born in the colony.
(Children, school and learning)

name: tooyoungtowork
description:
Timmy is too young to work.
(Children, school and learning)

name: cowardly
description:
Timmy always shies away from danger. he is usually the first to flee from battle.
(Combat Extended)

name: brave
description:
Few things scare Timmy. In battle he stands unfazed where others panic and flee.
(Combat Extended)

name: fearless
description:
Timmy laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, Timmy seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.
(Combat Extended)

name: aesthete
description:
Timmy loves beautiful things, and really cares about how his enviroment looks.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: animalaficionado
description:
Timmy loves animals. he doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: animalabhorrent
description:
Timmy just isn't an "animal person." he doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like him, either.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: builder
description:
Timmy loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But he tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: butcher
description:
Timmy enjoys preparing meat for cooking. his butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if he's dealing with animal corpses. he's terrible with mechanoids.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: claustrophobic
description:
Timmy is claustrophobic. he is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: coldlover
description:
Timmy loves colder temperatures. he'll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: deepsleeper
description:
Timmy can sleep through anything.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: dullard
description:
Timmy is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: gourmet
description:
Timmy has a passion for food preparation. his culinary creations are quite tasty, but he tends to take a while getting them "just right."
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: heatlover
description:
Timmy loves the heat. he'll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: inept
description:
he means well, but Timmy is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: coordinated
description:
Timmy is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: unstoppable
description:
Timmy has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. he is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: ironman
description:
Timmy has a high tolerance for pain.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: lowpaintolerance
description:
Timmy will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: inventor
description:
Strange new ideas just appear in Timmy's mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to him, but he always seems distracted.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: cranialnervepalsy
description:
Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless they are right in front of them.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: eagle-eyed
description:
Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: neatfreak
description:
Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: nibbler
description:
Timmy picks at his food, taking extra time to finish his meals.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: glutton
description:
Timmy devours his meals much faster than others.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: nyctophobe
description:
Timmy is really afraid of the dark.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: nyctophile
description:
Timmy doesn't fear the dark at all.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: idealist
description:
Timmy refuses to accept less than his best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. he's less likely to fail when doing something, but he works slowly.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: poormedic
description:
Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. Timmy is one of those people.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: skilledmedic
description:
Timmy seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in his care will likely fare well.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: mastermedic
description:
Timmy has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between his steady, skilled hands and his inspiring bedside manner, patients in his care will have little to fear.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: rockhound
description:
Timmy enjoys working with rocks. his mining speed is increased, but his lack of interest in other areas slows him down when doing other jobs. And he hates working with plants.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: savant
description:
Timmy is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But he's almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: decentlearner
description:
Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: sucker
description:
Timmy just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. he'll pay more than he should, and still think that he got a good deal. 
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: haggler
description:
Timmy likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. he tends to get better prices than most people.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: mastertrader
description:
Timmy always gets the best deals.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: carefulshooter
description:
Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: trigger-happy
description:
Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: deadshot
description:
Timmy knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: uncouth
description:
Subtlety? Diplomacy? Timmy barely even understands the meaning of the words.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: diplomat
description:
Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: masterdiplomat
description:
Timmy has such a way with words that he always manages to cool down a tense situation. he could talk for days and people would still listen.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: weakconstitution
description:
Timmy is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: strongconstitution
description:
Timmy's body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: brownthumb
description:
Timmy is a terrible gardener. The only thing he seems able to grow is weeds.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: greenthumb
description:
Timmy is a great gardener. The only thing he wants is a greener world.
((KV) Consolidated Traits)

name: mysteriousenergy
description:
NAME is gives a strange impression to the opponent.
(Ferian Race)

name: robot
description:
NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.
(Misc. Robots)

name: hatesdumblabor
description:
Timmy detests manual labor, feeling that tasks such as cleaning and hauling are beneath him. he will perform such tasks more slowly than others would, and will also carry less per load when required to haul.
(More Than Capable)

name: adorable
description:
Timmy is adorable being with smooth and charming voice. There is something mysterious about him that attracts everyone around. Even plants start to bloom around Timmy...
(Vulpes - Adorable Foxes! (1.2))

name: confident
description:
Timmy is confident that everything will work out for the best.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: overweight
description:
Timmy is seriously overweight. he moves slowly, and works even slower.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: athletic
description:
Timmy has honed his mind and body for most of his life.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: dexterous
description:
Timmy demonstrates neat skill, especially with his hands.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: perceptive
description:
Timmy has a keen eye, and can quickly spot a target.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: clean
description:
Timmy is fastidious to a fault.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: near-sighted
description:
Timmy has a hard time seeing things clearly unless he is relatively close to it.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: quicklearner
description:
Timmy has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: glutton
description:
Some people use a spoon to eat. Timmy uses a shovel...
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: persuasive
description:
Timmy is good at persuading someone to do or believe something through reasoning or the use of temptation.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: heavysleeper
description:
Timmy could sleep through an earthquake.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: pervert
description:
Timmy is an extreme pervert. he doesn't mind sharing a room, or streaking. It makes others feel incredibly uncomfortable.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: morbid
description:
Ashes to ashes and dust to dust. Timmy is fascinated by corpses and decay.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: carefulsurgeon
description:
Timmy takes medicine very seriously. he wants to do no harm and isn't afraid to take longer to do the job right.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: naturalbutcher
description:
Sometimes it's hard to tell where the knife stops and Timmy starts. People like to say that "if it bleeds Timmy can skin it and split it".
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: lovedbyanimals
description:
Timmy is loved by animals, but people don't feel quite the same.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: geniusinventor
description:
Strange new ideas just appear in the mind of Timmy. Researching new technology comes easily to Timmy, but he always seems distracted.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: greenthumb
description:
Timmy has a passion for gardening. he knows exactly what a plant needs to grow happily.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: efficientbuilder
description:
Timmy doesn't like to waste materials. he takes great care in his work.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: fastminer
description:
Timmy knows how to exploit the cleavage of rocks. he doesn't understand why plants are so much more fragile though.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: sucker
description:
They say a sucker is born every minute, and Timmy is that sucker.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: amateurhaggler
description:
Timmy likes to haggle. he gets better prices than most people.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: hagglingenthusiast
description:
Timmy always gets the best deals - so much so that others often fail to realize they're being duped.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: awkward
description:
The elephant in the room is named Timmy.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: tucker
description:
"That's a lotta graves. Lotta holes to fill. Bow-Chicka-Bow-Wow" - Timmy, probably.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: melodicvoice
description:
Timmy could talk for days on end and people would still listen to that sweet voice.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: uncouth
description:
Subtle is the game of diplomacy, and subtle, Timmy is not.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: diplomatic
description:
Timmy knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: verydiplomatic
description:
Timmy has such a way with him words and gifts that he always manages to cool down a tense situation.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: shootingamateur
description:
Timmy has never held a gun in him hands. The weight of the cold metal in him hands makes he shudder uncontrollably.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: shootingenthusiast
description:
Timmy knows him way with a gun.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: shootingprofessional
description:
"My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life." - Timmy, probably.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: herculean
description:
Brave Timmy, born with impossible strength and force of will.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: achillean
description:
Timmy is said to have been dipped in the river of death, he seems invulnerable in battle.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: odyssean
description:
Craftier by far than any mortal man, Timmy is also a very capable warrior.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: ares'wrath
description:
Feared by him enemies and worshiped by warriors, Timmy is a bloodthirsty embodiment of war.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: artemis'blessing
description:
Timmy's natural instinct to protect and nurture the people led him to champion the hunt.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: aphrodite'sgrace
description:
So wondrous is Timmy to behold that one look can inspire tears, desire, jealousy, and love.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: mercury'sblessing
description:
It is said that Timmy can leap the space between lightning and thunder, outfox the fox king, and reach tomorrow before the sun.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: sylvanus'blessing
description:
Companion to all woodland creatures, both mundane and fantastic, Timmy protects and nurtures those that respect his domain.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: vulcan'sfire
description:
Timmy crafts with fire and forge as an artist would with paint and brush.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: imhotep'swisdom
description:
Timmy sends to sleep those who suffer, the new day bringing good health to them.
(Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional))

name: germaphobe
description:
Timmy is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

name: hygienic
description:
Timmy is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

name: unhygienic
description:
Timmy is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

name: slob
description:
Timmy has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
(Dubs Bad Hygiene)

name: frailback
description:
Timmy has a frail back so he can't carry as much as the average person.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: strongback
description:
Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: verystrongback
description:
Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry twice as much as a normal person.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: animalfriend
description:
Timmy has a passion for animals. he gets bonuses to all animal interactions.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: ghoulish
description:
Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: radresistant
description:
Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: actionboy
description:
There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: actiongirl
description:
There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: quickhands
description:
Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: idiotsavant
description:
Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he learns twice as fast but works slower than normal, he is also incapable handling some tasks.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: charismatic
description:
Timmy has a charismatic personality. he gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: verycharismatic
description:
Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: gunnut
description:
Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns. he gets a mood bonus while holding a ranged weapon.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: rooted
description:
Timmy is part tree! he can really take a beating!
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: intimidating
description:
Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: veryintimidating
description:
Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a big advantage in social interactions.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: scrapper
description:
Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials. 
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: fortunefinder
description:
Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: pooraim
description:
Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: steadyaim
description:
Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: agile
description:
Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: ninja-like
description:
Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: stupid
description:
Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: intelligent
description:
Timmy is smarter than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: veryintelligent
description:
Timmy is very smart. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: oblivious
description:
Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: perceptive
description:
Timmy has a good awareness of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: veryperceptive
description:
Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: scrounger
description:
Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: enduring
description:
Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: veryenduring
description:
Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
(Fallout Traits (Continued))

name: fisherman
description:
Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
(Vanilla Fishing Expanded)

name: absent-minded
description:
Timmy tends to occasionally allow their mind to drift, even in the middle of working.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: eccentric
description:
Timmy has a loose screw or two, a small trade off for being naturally scientifically inclined.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: perfectionist
description:
Timmy strives for perfection in his work. They will naturally produce better quality products at the expense of time. However, making a low quality product will upset them. Additionally, they may very rarely quit a project mid attempt if they don't like the direction its going in.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: coward
description:
While fully capable of warfare in theory, Timmy's fight or flight instincts heavily lean towards flight, and he will try to hide or run as a first priority.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: brave
description:
Timmy has a higher mental and physical fortitude compared to most and can more readily adapt to harsh environments in the rimworlds.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: clumsy
description:
Minor bruises and scrapes plague Timmy all too often, mostly due to uncoordinated tripping or falling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: heatinclined
description:
Timmy loves the brightness and heat of a dry summer day. They don't mind working up a sweat or sleeping in the warmth either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: coldinclined
description:
Timmy loves the overcast and cold of a brisk winter night. They don't mind getting chilly or sleeping in the cold either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: heavysleeper
description:
A bomb could go off next to Timmy while they sleep and they'd continue to do so. They can't be bothered to defend the colony mid catnap, either.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: neat
description:
Timmy is naturally hygenic and organized. They will not track in dirt or throw trash anywhere, and feel happy while cleaning.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: slob
description:
Timmy is sloppy naturally and leaves trash and dirt everywhere it seems. At least they're not much bothered by messes.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: workaholic
description:
Timmy has problems taking breaks or resting mid job. he will continue to work even sacrificing their health or sleep.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: ironstomach
description:
Timmy has never felt nausea in his life. Throwing up or food poisoning is foreign to him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: animallover
description:
Timmy can't stand mistreatment of animals. he will feel happier being nuzzled or being a master to a bonded animal, but will be more deeply crushed when not master of a bonded animal or seeing one die. They also refuse to butcher.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: animalhater
description:
Timmy believes deeply in human superiority. Killing animals will please them and the colony losing an animal is a cherry on top according to them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: big-boned
description:
Whether because they're a bit chunky or because they shift their weight oddly, Timmy has broken a few chairs in their time and is likely to break more.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: rebel
description:
Timmy only plays by their own rules, and will roll their eyes and take it easy while doing any task they've been forced to do.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: submissive
description:
Timmy needs clear instructions on how, and when to do certain things and will only work at a normal speed when being forced to do something.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: vengeful
description:
Timmy is fueled by spite. They can't stand walking on the same soil as their rivals and will be elated by news of their life ending.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: technophobe
description:
Whether by past trauma or fear of change, Timmy rejects modernity. They may randomly punch or attack mechanical devices and refuse to learn or research anything about them. They also love killing mechanoids.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: fun-loving
description:
Timmy always recalls the good times and lives to party, any party attended will be remembered for many times longer than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: dunce
description:
Timmy has hindered mental capacities. While slow to learn and hard to speak with, they tend to be much happier naturally.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: martialartist
description:
Timmy learned a specific move in melee combat which allows them to disarm opponents and will use it frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: snob
description:
Timmy believes they belong in high society, and loves nothing more than critiquing art and brushing elbows with royalty.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: squeamish
description:
Sour stomach plagues Timmy any time they're around too much blood or rotting corpses. Vomiting is just part of life for him.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: anxious
description:
Timmy feels naturally anxious, but especially from social situations. They will not attend any gatherings and may occasionally need alone time in their room to breathe.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: insatiable
description:
No amount of lovin' is enough lovin' for Timmy. he will tend to jump from partner to partner and tumble between the sheets with them frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: prude
description:
Timmy refuses to give their body to anybody but their spouse and would never fathom initiating a divorce. They also hate being nude much more than other pawns.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: couchpotato
description:
An armchair and flatscreen is all Timmy needs to be happy. Even reruns or ancient commercials are entertaining to them, they will never grow bored of television and tend to watch it more, as well as feel pleased after doing so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: catperson
description:
Timmy is mad for all things feline. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with cats, however they're not a fan of dogs.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: dogperson
description:
Timmy is mad for all things canine. They will naturally gravitate towards bonding with dogs, however they're not a fan of cats.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: prodigy
description:
Timmy is a natural scientist. They research much faster and recall things better. However, they'll be upset without a laboratory dedicated to their work and tend to stress out more frequently.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: menagerist
description:
Timmy believes animals are integral to the way society and life functions from furry friends to sources of food. They love having as many as possible and are particularly good at taming and training them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: oceanlover
description:
The sea calls to Timmy. he feels happier just being near the ocean or a deep river.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: mountainlover
description:
The mountains call to Timmy. he feels happier just being near a large mountain.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: madsurgeon
description:
Timmy has a twisted secret. he treats organ harvesting like a sick experiment, and does not even blink at the idea. While harvesting one will make them happy, going too long without giving in to their compulsion will upset them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: drunkenmaster
description:
Timmy is supposedly a hand-to-hand combat specialist, but only when inebriated. They claim to become more talented the more drunk they are.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: kleptomaniac
description:
Timmy is compulsed to steal and take things that don't belong to them, even if it means angering the other party.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: stoner
description:
Smokeleaf culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores smokeleaf and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: lush
description:
Alcohol culture is just part of life for Timmy. he absolutely adores booze and would rather die before giving it up.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: wanderlust
description:
Timmy loves to travel and does so swiftly, but can grow upset if they haven't done so in a while. They are also quite adept at foraging while traveling.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: insomniac
description:
Timmy is never really asleep or awake. he is almost zombie like, lurching along and working very slowly, and will only sleep once every three days or so.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: worldweary
description:
Timmy has grown tired of the world and needs to be constantly distracted to stop dark thoughts. his bleak personality is a big downer and therefore it is very hard to become friends with them.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: desensitized
description:
Timmy is hardened through what can only be presumed as old emotional trauma. They feel absolutely nothing from lost animals, colonists, family, prisoners or dead bodies.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: refinedpalate
description:
Only the finest of culinary creations may grace the lips of Timmy. They feel neutral towards mundane meals, but will laud and savour lavish meals down to the last bite.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: academian
description:
Whether through studying ancient manuscripts or years of scholastic pursuit Timmy is surprisingly well read on a variety of topics, particularly science and medical practice.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: groundbreaker
description:
Timmy strongly believes infrastucture rules all and is a natural born stoneworker.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: gastronomist
description:
In the eyes of Timmy food is art, their culinary creations are incredibly beautiful, amazing to taste, and almost always safe to eat.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: ecologist
description:
Flora and fauna are both vital to Timmy. They use all parts of plants and animals and strongly appreciate mother Gaia's blessings.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: tycoon
description:
Timmy has an eye for silver and a tongue made from it. They believe their products are the best products and he will likely convince you if given the chance.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: thickskinned
description:
Timmy is strangely hypercoagulating and will bleed much more slowly than most.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: thinskinned
description:
Timmy is strangely hemophilic and tends to bleed much more profusely than others.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)

name: schizoid
description:
Timmy has trouble expressing themselves until its all too much to bear, whereafter they will have an utter meltdown.
(Vanilla Traits Expanded)
